synopsis: Apprentice detectives Manami and Ayaka arrive to pick up a package for a client, only to discover that it is a woman and wind up in the middle of a gun fight. Shu arrives just in time.

Porilyn has ordered Shu to protect the blond woman he picked up, but she isn’t looking too good. Doc will work to keep her alive, but that’s no easy job when men can’t even touch her without getting zapped!
Manami’s high school friend, Yuko, has gone missing. With a music producer interested in hiring Yuko and her brother Seiji, Manami has to hurry and find her friend fast.
Ayaka sees Sara gasping in pain on the roof of their building. Her arm appears to have transformed into glowing glass.

After police detectives JJ and Lawrence read Ayaka’s post about her glass maiden sighting, they decide to give Ayaka a little visit. Manami and Akira help Ayaka shoo the police away, but Lawrence orders JJ to keep a watch over their agency.
Sara storms the building to rescue Manami and Ayaka. When Kito sees Sara fighting, he is ecstatic since he had thought she would be on the verge of death.
After watching Sara get shot, Manami has decided she needs a gun if she’s seriously going to protect Sara. Unfortunately, no one in town is willing to sell her one.

Sophie and JJ are recording the underground battle between the glass maidens and the SWAT.  Just as they finish gathering information, the battle comes to an end. Now there’s nothing to distract the guards and researchers from Sophie and JJ!
